entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
